documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.description: Learn about nishchay framework by reading each topic one by one.

learningProgress.title: Learning progress
learningProgress.line-1: Each topic estimated with average reading time.
learningProgress.line-2: Learning center tracks how much time you read each topic.
learningProgress.line-3: Track your learning progress in profile

notes.title: Notes
notes.line-1: Notes helps you concenrate on topic and are useful when revising topics in the future.
notes.line-2: Add note to any topic for your own use.
notes.line-3: Notes are visible to you only.

discord.title: Discord
discord.description: Discord lets communicate directly via voice, video, or text. You can join discord to ask your doubts and to know what other developers are doing.

whatsapp.title: WhatsApp
whatsapp.description: If you want direct help, you can also contact us on WhatsApp for any kind of help.
